label.text: Address for optional switch throw/close messages

display.tooltip: Required for Sw Throw/Close Messages
Use for special logic

label.text: Send switch throw messages on logic cell true

display.tooltip: Use for special logic

label.text: Send switch close message on logic cell false
Send primary input state at Digitrax interrogation request

display.tooltip: This does not effect output control of the logic cells

label.text: Use common cathode LEDs on all outputs

display.tooltip: Required for ops mode (on the main programming)
Sets the Ops Mode address

label.text: This is the same as a Loco address

display.tooltip: Delay start up time = value x .256 seconds

label.text: The Custom Programmer format is recommended
